formulas.name: formulaLeadPhoneMatches
formulas.expression: substitute( substitute( substitute( substitute({!Enter_your_phone_number},"-","") , " ", "") ,"(","") ,")","") == substitute( substitute( substitute( substitute({!find_Lead.Phone},"-","") , " ", "") ,"(","") ,")","")

fields.name: Informationnotfound
fields.fieldText: We're sorry, the information that you have entered does not match the information we have on file. Please re-enter the information or contact us using the information in your confirmation email or text.

fields.name: ExistingInfo_0
fields.fieldText:
Your Updated Appointment:

Name: {!find_Lead.Name}

Email: {!find_Lead.Email}

Phone: {!find_Lead.Phone}

Appointment Number: {!find_existing_SA_0.AppointmentNumber}

Start: {!find_existing_SA_0.SchedStartTime}

End: {!find_existing_SA_0.SchedEndTime}

{!formulaNewResource}

fields.name: ExistingInfo

Email: {!find_Lead.Email}
